column5: Is it normal for him to distract you, grab your fishing rod *when asking him a Q and he changes the subject on you so you stop and think **why is he asking me this** steel you rod* and take over and land your fish?  Just wondering, HAHAHAHAHA Can't wait for the report SNAG!
lol...the best way to teach someone is to actually physically show you how to do it correctly....see there is always a price to someone elses knowledge...lol

Is it normal for some psychopath to hit you with a rock and steal your gear and land your fish and take a picture with your camera and then post a thread of LIES?  Hope you have a good lawyer.  Don't ever fish with GBW.  I always thought this site should have a screening process for dangerous individuals.  (but not retroactive)
Couldn't agree more!  That's how I learn!
Shenanigans..  He's a bush lurker who will stop at nothing to get there first!!!  C'mon Shnag.  Give it up!!
